Text: p.s.   there is an enhanced portion from disc 1 that i couldn't include in this torrent because the tpb upload page wouldn't let me include it with music files (there's an application in the folder.)   it has a slide show with some of joni's art and the lyrics to the songs on the discs---when you make a song lyrics selection, the song will actually play and you can sing or read along.  the songs are in quicktime audio format at 256 kbps.  if anyone wants this, leave a comment and i will try to upload the files some other way.  thanks

I'd already downloaded this months ago, but forgot to say "thank you".

So i make up for it now ;)
